original_text: And the little chambers thereof were three on this side and three on that side; and the posts thereof and the arches thereof were after the measure of the first gate: the length thereof was fifty cubits, and the breadth five and twenty cubits.
korean_text: 길이는 쉰 척이요 너비는 스물다섯 척이며 문지기 방이 이쪽에도 셋이요 저쪽에도 셋이요 그 벽과 그 현관도 먼저 측량한 문간과 같으며

sentences.original_text: And little chambers thereof were three on this side
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그 작은 방들이 이쪽에 세 개 있었고

sentences.original_text: and posts thereof and arches thereof were after measure of first gate
sentences.korean_translation: 그 기둥들과 아치들은 첫 번째 문의 치수에 따랐으며

sentences.original_text: and breadth five and twenty cubits
